title: Snow Crash
description: In a near-future America fractured into corporate city-states, Hiro Protagonist, a pizza delivery driver and hacker, investigates a mysterious computer virus called Snow Crash that affects both the virtual reality Metaverse and the real world. He teams up with Y.T., a teenage skateboard courier, to unravel the origins of the virus and its connection to ancient Sumerian mythology. The novel blends fast-paced action with philosophical and technological speculation.
